home.text: I am excited about Programming, Digital Marketing and developing my skills in the field in which I specialize. I consider myself responsible, disciplined and enthusiastic. I enjoy working as a team and using these meetings to gain knowledge. I am passionate about books about personal development and the Marvel cinematic universe.
